    • Constructor Detail

      • EngineImpl

        public EngineImpl(int queuesInitialSize)
        default constructor
        Parameters:
        queuesInitialSize - should be set regarding JVM memory and number of stocks. with 4096MB of JVM memory, 48 stocks and queuesInitialSize=3000000 OutOfMemory is not happening
